bio: I am a reef scientist, who is exploring the integration of public goods and DeSci with web3 communities to innovate and create a protopian a world in Latam √ú
contributionDescription:
I seek solo recognition for funding public goods through DeSci/ReFi in the Optimism ecosystem. This includes initiatives like community-building, grants, educational events, conservation efforts, and innovative projects. My contributions aim to support sustainability and make a positive impact. My efforts encompass community building, diverse funding sources, educational outreach, sustainable innovation discussions, collaborative meetups, coral reef regeneration, transparent reporting, thought leadership engagement, targeted outreach, and innovative NFT ventures, all contributing to the growth and impact of Optimism.

Public goods thrive with Optimism!

impactDescription: These Optimism initiatives have had a profound impact. They include establishing the QF GreenPill Mexico chapter, securing grants for various projects, engaging the Hispanic community, showcasing sustainable innovation, and emphasizing real-world impact through initiatives like MesoReefDAO. Additionally, exploring and distribution mechanisms and collecting NFTs on Zora and OP adding further innovation to the collective. Creation of mirror.xyz entries regarding to Ethereum first cohort of writers, greenpill regen cohort and DeSci. These efforts collectively drive towards a more inclusive and sustainable future within the Optimism community to Latam. Divulgation of sentences for Optimism updates and news in Week Ethereum News (ES) for hispanic people.
